thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 19 of 474
thread.title: Tamara

author: Tamara
title: Tamara
text:
I am a frequent customer, and generally the ordering process goes perfectly, but in this order my delivery process was a huge pain.
I submitted a written request with my order for UPS not to leave this package at the local access point after the first delivery attempt, which is what they always do now. But my request notes didn't make it onto my shipping label, so UPS left my package at a place where I couldn't get it; I was not able to carry this heavy box home from there.
It took me three phone calls to UPS, and an extra week and a half, to get them to redeliver to my apartment. During that time I also sent an email to Clearbags Customer Service, but never heard back.
** Edited -- Thanks so much for your reply, for the credit, and for making my shipping request note permanent. I really appreciate the help!
